project_plan.name: Python-based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, keeps track of their score, and displays it at the end of the game. Questions and answers will be stored in a variable inside the code.

task.name: Design the structure for the quiz game, including how questions are stored and how the game flow will be managed.
Implement the functionality to display questions and collect user answers.
Implement scoring logic to keep track of user points based on correct answers.
Implement functionality to display the final score at the end of the game.
Write tests for the implemented features to ensure they function correctly.
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly.
